channel.title: How to change Home Teleport and Respawn Location?
channel.description: Can Anyone give me a tut or a snippet that can help me does this im puzzled:(. I changed co-ordinates but its not working help!

item.title: How to change Home Teleport and Respawn Location?
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.source: How to change Home Teleport and Respawn Location?

item.title: How to change Home Teleport and Respawn Location?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“M0R3TANK1NG, post:2, topic:513232”]You can only change the spawn location with the coordinates.

The home could also work with the spawn location, you might have to look up to spellbook and the doAction would be to the coordinates set from the spawn location.

Also, make sure you’ve compiled otherwise it won’t work.[/quote]
Don’t say “You can only do this”
and then tell them how to do the other.

I’m going to assume you have a PI.
Open the Config.java and the respawn/start coords are in there.
Then open clickingbuttons.java
(This also assumes you have it under your home teleport button and that the case ID is the same)
Find 4171/50056
Replace with:

		case 4171:

		case 50056:
			final String type = c.playerMagicBook == 0 ? "modern" : "ancient";
			c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.START_LOCATION_X,
					Config.START_LOCATION_Y, 0, type);
			break;

They will now teleport you to START_LOCATION_X and START_LOCATION_Y that are found in the Config.Java file.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change Home Teleport and Respawn Location?

item.title: How to change Home Teleport and Respawn Location?
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

You can only change the spawn location with the coordinates.

The home could also work with the spawn location, you might have to look up to spellbook and the doAction would be to the coordinates set from the spawn location.

Also, make sure you’ve compiled otherwise it won’t work.

Read full topic
